name: Gottem Fist
description:
She's got'em fists, and she's got it handled! Join Gottem Gal in punching out some enemies with her sproingy limbs!

CONTROLS:

WASD to Move

Space to Jump

Mouse to Aim

Mouse Buttons to Swing! Them! Fists!

CREDITS:

Game and Art: Tara

Music: Greg Hunter https://themopssongs.bandcamp.com/

Other Assets:

Ickle Font Pack https://jackoatley.itch.io/ikkle-font-pack

And I guess I should point out that Gottem Gal looks kinda like a certain plumber, who I used as reference for drawing a 16x16 character.

Gottem Fist is the result of my first game jam. The game was uploaded for United Game Jam, with the theme of "TWO". I interpreted this quite simply: the gal's got two fists! And she swings'em around with right and left click.

I plan to keep working on it, mainly just to clean it up, y'know, add the animations and polish I didn't have time for, but maybe I'll make something a bit more interesting out of it in the future.

If you participated in the jam, you can rate it on the jam page: https://itch.io/jam/united-game-jam-2020/rate/682563
